TEXT: The applicants , whose names appear in the appendix , are NORP nationals .
They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .
s , may be summarised as follows .
The applicants , accused of being members of the illegal organisation Dev - Yol , ( Revolutionary Way ) , were taken into police custody on various dates DATE .

In DATE , the military public prosecutor instituted criminal proceedings against the applicants in GPE . It was alleged that the applicants were members of an illegal organisation whose aim was to undermine the constitutional order and replace it with a NORP - Leninist regime . The prosecution called for the applicants to be sentenced pursuant to LAW of LAW .
All the applicants were released pending trial on various dates DATE . CARDINAL of the applicants , PERSON , was kept in detention on remand until DATE .
On DATE ORG delivered its judgment and acquitted the applicants of the charges against them .

The public prosecutor challenged the judgment of the first instance court as regards CARDINAL of the applicants . However , he did not appeal against the acquittals of CARDINAL of the applicants , namely PERSON , PERSON , PERSON , PERSON , and the decision against them became final in DATE .

Pursuant to the law No . CARDINAL promulgated on DATE the case - file was transferred to a non - military court , ORG . On DATE ORG ordered that the criminal proceedings against the applicants be terminated on the ground that the statutory time - limit under LAW of LAW had expired .
The applicants’ lawyer obtained a copy of this decision in DATE .
